net.rptools.maptool.model.Label.label: Macro results that should be secret from the player will be shown only to the GM.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(d20+Mod < 16): result = "fails"; result = "succeeds"] [r:token.name] attempts a saving throw versus Dragon Breath, and [r:result]!
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Breath Weapon

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(d20+Mod < 15): result = "fails"; result = "succeeds"] [r:token.name] attempts a saving throw versus Rod, Staff, or Wand, and [r:result]!
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Rod, Staff, Wand

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(d20+Mod < 13): result = "fails"; result = "succeeds"] [r:token.name] attempts a saving throw versus Death, Paralysis, or Poison, and [r:result]!
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Death, Paralysis, Poison

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(d20+Mod < 14): result = "fails"; result = "succeeds"] [r:token.name] attempts a saving throw versus Petrification or Polymorph, and [r:result]!
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Petrification, Polymorph

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(d20+Mod < 16): result = "fails"; result = "succeeds"] [r:token.name] attempts a saving throw versus Spells, and [r:result]!
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Spells

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: Clyde rolls initiative for the group, getting a result of [1d6].
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Initiative

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: Clyde rolls for surprise for the group, getting a result of [1d6].
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Surprise

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:attack = 1d20] [h:dmgs = 1d4+1] [r:token.name] attacks with a bite!
Attack Roll: [r:attack] (sufficient to hit AC [r:THAC0-attack])
Damage: [r:dmgs]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bite

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:attack = 1d20] [h:dmgs = 1d3] [r:token.name] attacks with a bite!
Attack Roll: [r:attack] (sufficient to hit AC [r:THAC0-attack])
Damage: [r:dmgs]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Claw

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:attack = 1d20] [h:dmgs = 1d8] [r:token.name] attacks with a stone battleaxe!
Attack Roll: [r:attack] (sufficient to hit AC [r:THAC0-attack])
Damage: [r:dmgs]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Stone Axe

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Ask the user for input. [DmgValue = DamageTaken] [OldHP = hp] [NewHP = min(max(-10, hp - DmgValue))] [hp = NewHP] Compute the token state. [IsDisabled = if(NewHP > -10 && NewHP < 0, 1, 0)] [IsDead = if(NewHP == -10, 1, 0)] [state.Disabled = IsDisabled] [state.Dead = IsDead] --> {DmgValue} points of damage are taken.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Damage

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:attack = 1d20+MeleeToHit] [h:dmgs = 1d4+MeleeDmg] [h:dmgl = 1d3+MeleeDmg] [r:token.name] attacks with a dagger!
Attack Roll: [r:attack] (sufficient to hit AC [r:THAC0-attack])
Damage: [r:dmgs] ([r:dmgl] against larger than man-sized creatures)
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Dagger

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:attack = 1d20+RangedToHit] [h:dmgr = 1d4+1] [r:token.name] attacks with a light crossbow!
Attack Roll: [r:attack] (sufficient to hit AC [r:THAC0-attack])
Damage: [r:dmgr]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Crossbow

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h,if(d100 > 40): result = "fails"; result = "succeeds"] [r:token.name] attempts to Pick Pockets, and [r:result]! [h,if(d100 < 10): victim="The victim is alerted!"; victim = "The victim is unaware."]
[r,g:victim]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Pick Pockets
